column2: Arxiv: classic datasets with reduced config and minibatch kmeans

[('None', None), ('RandomOverSampler', RandomOverSampler(random_state=2295708137, ratio='auto')), ('SMOTE', SMOTE(k=None, k_neighbors=5, kind='regular', m=None, m_neighbors=10, n_jobs=1, out_step=0.5, random_state=None, ratio='auto', svm_estimator=None), [{'k_neighbors': [3, 5, 20]}]), ('B1-SMOTE', SMOTE(k=None, k_neighbors=5, kind='borderline1', m=None, m_neighbors=10, n_jobs=1, out_step=0.5, random_state=None, ratio='auto', svm_estimator=None), [{'k_neighbors': [3, 5, 20]}]), ('B2-SMOTE', SMOTE(k=None, k_neighbors=5, kind='borderline2', m=None, m_neighbors=10, n_jobs=1, out_step=0.5, random_state=None, ratio='auto', svm_estimator=None), [{'k_neighbors': [3, 5, 20]}]), ('KMeansSMOTE', KMeansSMOTE(density_power=None, imbalance_ratio_threshold=1.0, kmeans_args={}, minority_weight=0.66, n_jobs=1, random_state=None, ratio='auto', smote_args={}, use_minibatch_kmeans=True), [{'use_minibatch_kmeans': [True], 'kmeans_args': [{'n_clusters': 2}, {'n_clusters': 20}, {'n_clusters': 50}, {'n_clusters': 100}, {'n_clusters': 250}, {'n_clusters': 500}], 'imbalance_ratio_threshold': [1, inf], 'n_jobs': [-1], 'density_power': [None, 0, 2], 'smote_args': [{'k_neighbors': 3}, {'k_neighbors': 5}, {'k_neighbors': 20}, {'k_neighbors': inf}]}, {'use_minibatch_kmeans': [True], 'kmeans_args': [{'n_clusters': 1}], 'imbalance_ratio_threshold': [inf], 'n_jobs': [-1], 'smote_args': [{'k_neighbors': 3}, {'k_neighbors': 5}, {'k_neighbors': 20}]}])]
